name: Kale Burger
description: Combining the taste of cow with the nutrition of kale!
directions: Preheat oven to 500 degrees, put in a cow. Wait 10 minutes. Put in some kale. Take out cow and kale. Put on bun. Serve HOT!

name: Poodle Cake (For your puppy!)
description: Poople cakes! Perfect for pet poodle!
directions: Mix kibble with hot dog. Bake at 500 degrees for 25 minutes. DO NOT ADD CHOCOLATE

name: Peanut Butter Coffee Brownie
description: Just looking has caused people to gain 10 pounds!
ingredients: Chocolate, Peanut Butter, Espresso, Cream Cheese
directions: Chew the espresso beans to a pulp, spit them into the bowl. Now mix in the chocolate, cream cheese, and peanut butter. Bake at 450 for 45 minutes

name: Danny's Toasted Frozen Bagels
directions: Slice bagels (if not already sliced), pop into toster, wait until toasted. Spread butter or jam as desired. Caution! Bagel will be very hard to bite and chew. After all, these are unwanted month-old bagels slowly dehydrated in the freezer.
